application_type_full: Tree works: Trees in conservation areas/subject to TPOs
description: Front Garden:T1 - Large Plane -Crown thin 20% removing major deadwood.-Cut back lateral branches by 2-3metres (regrowth) ensuring a 2-3metre clearance of building.-Crown lift to 5metres over carriageway.-Cut back from streetlamp.-Carry out aerial inspection paying particular attention for signs of Massaria.T2 - Large London Plane -Crown thin 20% removing major deadwood.-Cut back lateral branches by 2-3metres (regrowth) ensuring a 2-3metre clearance of building.-Crown lift to 5metres over carriageway.-Cut back from streetlamp.-Carry out aerial inspection paying particular attention for signs of Massaria.- T3 - Large London Plane -Crown thin 20 per cent removing major deadwood.-Cut back lateral branches by 2-3metres (regrowth) ensuring a 2-3metre clearance of building.-Crown lift to 5metres over carriageway.-Cut back from streetlamp.-Carry out aerial inspection paying particular attention for signs of Massaria.T4 - Large London Plane -Crown thin 20 per cent removing major deadwood.-Cut back lateral branches by 2-3metres (regrowth) ensuring a 2-3metre clearance of building.-Crown lift to 5metres over carriageway.-Cut back from streetlamp.-Carry out aerial inspection paying particular attention for signs of Massaria.
